parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2oa

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.62

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Environment

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> <code style<template><title>=</title></template>"float: right; font-size: 0.85em; margin: 0 0 0.5em 1.5em">12:00 - 1
(...) - 1
18:39 - 0.911201
18:42 - 0.576303
18:45 - 0.240862
18:48 - 0
(...) - 0
06:00 - 0.0695308
06:03 - 0.404731
06:06 - 0.739519
06:09 - 1
(...) - 1</code>
Returns the sun to moon transition state in range 0..1.<br>
The return value is either 0 or 1 most of the time, the in-between values only returned during a few minutes in the morning and in the evening, depending on the [[date]], and could be similar to shown here:

<div>
[[File:sunOrMoon VR up.png|200px|thumb|left|Sunrise in <template><title>arma3</title></template> VR]]
<div style<template><title>=</title></template>"float: left">[[File:sunOrMoon VR down.png|200px|thumb|left|Sunset in <template><title>arma3</title></template> VR]]</div>
</div>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[sunOrMoon]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[private]] _transitionState = [[sunOrMoon]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[moonIntensity]], [[moonPhase]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
